data.internal_url: Internal HASS URL. Should be accessible in the local network
data.ip: Loqed Host name or IP Address
data.name: Name to be shown in HASS

user.description:
Please enter a name, the local host-name or ip-address of the Bridge. Then visit https://app.loqed.com/API-Config and:
* Create an API-key: [add new api-key]
* Get the [Key] value in fill in beneath
* Get the [Local Key ID] and fill in beneath
* Get the [Authentication Key (base64)] from the Outgoing Webhooks via LOQED Bridge and fill in in bridgeKey
user.title: LOQED configuration
